sources.title: The Bad Visitor | Full Thriller Movie | Full Free 2023 Movie
sources.description:
The Bad Visitor | Full Thriller Movie | Full Free 2023 Movie

Vanessa and David are enjoying their beautiful lives in the suburbs of Georgia. Unannounced, a childhood friend of Vanessa's shows up to her doorstep seeking to rekindle their relationship. So happy to see her old friend, she takes her in with open arms not knowing that she is running from a violent past that is slowly catching up to her.

*Review* - "A Bad Visitor" (2023) is perhaps the most riveting movie I have seen in a while, keeping you at the edge with its myriad plot twists. Vanessa and David have the perfect suburban life in Georgia... until an unwelcome visitor surfaces out of nowhere: Vanessa's childhood friend. It is a joyous occasion for Vanessa as she tries to reconnect with long lost friend, not realizing that the latter hides a sinister secret. What unfolds next is an unbearable amount of tension as their once peaceful household turns into a nightmare filled with danger and discomforting truths. This movie kept me at the edge with its psychological drama and turning events, masking the truth until the very end. If you enjoy being shocked and love movies depicting obsession, betrayal and deception, "The Bad Visitor" should go straight to the top of your list. Trust is broken and the past unwilling to stay in the dark, find out the brutal suspense of this free 2023 thriller.

2023.  Stars: Cline Baker, Timothy Blocker Jr., Joel Thaddeus Braggs
